chain.help: Current network name as defined in BIP70 (main, test, regtest). Text value in labels.
chain.name: chain

blocks.help: The current number of blocks processed in the server.
blocks.name: blocks

headers.help: The current number of headers we have validated.
headers.name: headers

mediantime.help: Median time for the current best block.
mediantime.name: mediantime

initialblockdownload.help: Estimate of whether this node is in Initial Block Download mode.
initialblockdownload.name: initialblockdownload

size_on_disk.help: The estimated size of the block and undo files on disk.
size_on_disk.name: size_on_disk

pruned.help: If the blocks are subject to pruning.
pruned.name: pruned

warnings.help: Any network and blockchain warnings. Text value in labels.
warnings.name: warnings
